sentences.en: And whether they play in smoky cellar clubs or spacious concert hall, jazz musicians are drawing record crowds.
sentences.cn: 爵士音乐家们不论是在烟雾弥漫的地下室的俱乐部演奏,还是在豪华宽敞的音乐厅里表演, 都能吸引空前多的听众.

sentences.en: Cooking with the lid on gives the food that distinctive smoky flavour.
sentences.cn: 盖上盖子做会让这种食物有一种熏制般的独特风味。

sentences.en: He always has a smoke after dinner, and makes the room smoky.
sentences.cn: 他饭后总是吸支烟, 弄得屋子满是烟雾.
他有一双蓝灰色的眼睛透着朦胧梦幻般的美。

sentences.en: He would much rather have been crooning in a smoky bar.
sentences.cn: 他宁愿在烟雾缭绕的酒吧里哼唱歌曲。

sentences.en: Her young face looked sadly out of place in that smoky room.
sentences.cn: 她那张充满青春活力的脸,在这间烟雾腾腾的屋里显得极不相称.

sentences.en: His main problem was the extremely smoky atmosphere at work.
sentences.cn: 他面临的主要问题就是：工作场所总是烟雾弥漫。

sentences.en: It had an obnoxious smell and burnt with a smoky.
sentences.cn: 它有一种令人不快的气味,而且燃烧时多烟.

sentences.en: She was in the back of a smoky bar singing the blues.
sentences.cn: 她在烟雾弥漫的酒吧深处唱着布鲁斯歌曲.

sentences.en: The air had grown thick and smoky.
sentences.cn: 空气变得混浊,烟雾弥漫.

sentences.en: The color of the flowers gave a sparkle to the smoky air.
sentences.cn: 色彩缤纷的鲜花,在烟雾弥漫的空气里,显得分外赏心悦目.

sentences.en: The corridor opened into a low smoky room.
sentences.cn: 这条走廊通向一间烟雾弥漫的低矮房间。

sentences.en: The stranger's face still flared like a smoky torch.
sentences.cn: 那位陌生人的面容仍然象点燃的火距那样闪耀着.

sentences.en: The street began smoky and dark.
sentences.cn: 街上开始烟雾缭绕,黑了下来.

sentences.en: The swaying of the smoky little room was making Natalie queasy.
sentences.cn: 这个烟雾腾腾的小房间不住摇晃,使娜塔丽要想呕吐.

words.tran_cn: 冒烟的；烟熏味的；熏着的；呛人的；烟状的

trans.tran_cn: 多烟的，冒烟的，有烟熏味的，烟状的
